'''Jinn Shrines''' are an exploration mechanic in found in Sumeru. They are used to restore the Jinn's Might of [[Jinni in the Magic Bottle — Liloupar]], which becomes available after obtaining [[Liloupar]]'s fragment during {{Quest|Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part I}}. Jinn Shrines are marked with {{Icon|Jinn Shrine}} icon on the [[Minimap]].
